insert into sys_audit_log (req_client_ip, req_uri, req_type, req_method, session_id, req_time, returm_time, http_status_code, time_consuming, req_param_data, return_data) values (#{reqClientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{returmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{httpStatusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeConsuming,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reqParamData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{returnData,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.select: select id, req_client_ip, req_uri, req_type, req_method, session_id, req_time, returm_time, http_status_code, time_consuming, req_param_data, return_data from sys_audit_log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
